description: Try our easy to follow Deconstructed Bubble & Squeak With Poached Eggs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Deconstructed Bubble & Squeak With Poached Eggs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs basil (plus extra small leaves to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Place sweet potato and carrot in a microwave-safe bowl with 1/4 cup water. Cover and microwave on high for 8 minutes. Drain well.

Heat oil in a large, wide saucepan over medium heat. Add cooked vegetables, broccoli, capsicum and onion and cook, stirring regularly, for 7 minutes or until lightly browned and tender. Add ham, caraway seeds and chopped basil and cook for a further 2 minutes. Add spinach and cook for a further 1 minute or until wilted.

Meanwhile, fill a saucepan two-thirds with hot water, add vinegar and place over medium-high heat until bubbles appear on the base of the pan. Stir to create a whirlpool, then crack 2 eggs into water. Cook, without stirring, for 3 1/2 minutes or until cooked to your liking. Remove using a slotted spoon and drain on paper towel. Repeat with remaining eggs.
Serve bubble and squeak topped with feta, a poached egg, extra basil and lemon wedges.
